nodes.text: Kaasha Bateen was a female Rutian Twi'lek master strategist in the Free Ryloth Movement who was good with a blaster. While serving with the Free Ryloth Movement, she participated in the Pasa Novo campaign, where she met the smuggler Lando Calrissian, as well as during the Battle on Baltro. At some point, she was in a crew with Han Solo and Calrissian, the latter of whom she had a romantic relationship with. They went on a mission to stop Fyzen Gor from activating the Phylanx Redux Transmitter, which succeeded when Gor died at Solo's hands. Bateen was known to be good at the game saigok, which she described as "badass dejarik," playing the game with Calrissian and Chewbacca onboard the ZV-9 freighter Vermillion.
